title: Oregon Trail 5 (ISO)
description:
Oregon Trail 5 ISO From an original Disc Have fun.

This is the 5th and latest edition of a thrilling trailblazing adventure that kids and parents have enjoyed for years.

This program by The Learning Company is not only fun but helps kids develop real-life decision making and problem solving skills. Players apply history, geography and math in real-life settings.

Your goal is to lead a wagon party across the unknown to the new land. First you must organize your party, choosing people and supplies needed the complete the rugged journey. Should you choose a team with money or strong survival skills? Next you must decide how to spend your money. You have a limited budget for food and supplies. Then you are off!

Consult your guidebooks, read maps and study the landscape to find the best route. Can you survive the dangers of the journey, raging rivers, buffalo stampedes, sickness and more perils are around the bend.

Kids learn history firsthand and experience what it was like to live in the 1800s. There are authentic journals to read, maps and newspapers from the 1840s, and lots of people to meet and talk with.  Listen carefully to their advice.

The newest edition is packed with exciting new features including new characters, and an enhanced user interface. Players can really understand what is was like in the old west with animated mini-movies, campfire tales and a detailed journal with sketches of the west. 

This is an outstanding game that is great for kids and families to play together enhancing collaboration and cooperation. A great game for family night.

Minimum System Requirements: 

Windows 98/2000/ME/XP, Pentium 166 MHz+, 32 MB RAM, 120 MB hard disk space, 8X CD-ROM, 16-bit color 640X480, sound card and speakers.

We were not able to run this program on Windows Vista.

Macintosh Power PC 180 MHz+, System 8.6 - 9.2, OS X, 32 MB RAM, 120 MB hard disk space, 8X-CDROM, 1000s of colors 640X480, speakers.
